description.value:
Special: Corrosive, Flame, Spray

Note: Easily Concealed and leaves hands free, worn on wrist and connects to sealed case on the back. Fires a Corrosive Powedered Metal rather than promethium. Targets take additional 1d10 damage from being on fire, but put themselves out with +0 Agility Test.
